name: Chrome Gather Cookies
author: mangopdf <mangodotpdf@gmail.com>
description: Read all cookies from the Default Chrome profile of the target user.

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.

options.name: CHROME_BINARY_PATH
options.description: The path to the user's Chrome binary (leave blank to use the default for the OS)

options.name: WRITEABLE_DIR
options.description: Where to write the html used to steal cookies temporarily, and the cookies. Leave blank to use the default for the OS (/tmp or AppData\Local\Temp)

options.name: REMOTE_DEBUGGING_PORT
options.description: Port on target machine to use for remote debugging protocol
